did.unittitle:
Michigan State Federation of Women’s Clubs records
1896-1957
did.abstract: State-wide organization ccordinating some acitvites of local Women's Club; records include correspondence, reports and minutes of meetings.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The record group was the gift of Mrs. George Hunter (donor no. 3371) and came to the library in 1959.

accruals.p: No further additions to the papers are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Michigan State Federation of Women’s Clubs records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: In 1895, delegates from local women's clubs from throughout the state met in an organization convention to form the Michigan State Federation of Women's Clubs. The purpose of the organization then was to cooperate on those issues which were common to most of the state's women's clubs and to provide guidance to newly formed local groups.

scopecontent.p: The records of the organization relate primarily to the formative years of the Federation, the late 1890s to approximately 1920. Included are secretary's records and reports, correspondence, and committee materials.
